data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Malipatil, M. B. (2017): Indopamphantus makutaensis, a new genus and species, and Indopamphantini, a new tribe of Pamphantinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Geocoridae), as the first representative of the subfamily from the Oriental Region. Zootaxa 4242 (2): 281-298, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4242.2.4|5 occurrences
